thread.title: Gisele Bundchen celebrates husband Tom Brady's Super Bowl win with a kiss and by invading the pitch
thread.title_full: Gisele Bundchen celebrates husband Tom Brady's Super Bowl win with a kiss and by invading the pitch

author: Helena Horton
title: Gisele Bundchen celebrates husband Tom Brady's Super Bowl win with a kiss and by invading the pitch
text:
G isele Bundchen was elated when her husband Tom Brady won the Super Bowl for the Patriots. 
The supermodel had an epic celebration at the end of the game, planting a kiss on Brady and invading the pitch with her family.
This came shortly after she used her phone to film herself celebrating the win.
Gisele cannot even deal right now! #SuperBowl pic.twitter.com/n6QzEX8Suw 
‚Äî People Magazine (@people) February 6, 2017 She looked elated as she appeared to scream into the camera.
"Congratulations my love! @tombrady #gopats Parab√©ns meu amor! @tombrady," she wrote on Instagram.
A fter his family walked to the field, Brady managed to kiss his wife and cuddle his child. 
Four-year-old Vivian looked tired as her father celebrated his win.
Credit: Kevin C. Cox/Getty Images H e was also greeted by his mother Galynn Patricia Brady who has been fighting an undisclosed illness.
She was wearing a patterned headscarf to the event.
Bom dia! Game day! #superbowl #daddyslittlegirl ‚ú®‚ù§Ô∏è‚ú®üèà 
A photo posted by Gisele B√ºndchen (@gisele) on Feb 5, 2017 at 6:03am PST 
H is entire family seemed to support him and will him to win.
Tom Brady revealed earlier in the week that his wife had given him a special necklace to protect him during the event.
